verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him out of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H120><s%>, When any man of you offereth <S%H7126><s%> an oblation <S%H7133><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> your oblation <S%H7133><s%> of the cattle <S%H929><s%>, even of the herd <S%H1241><s%> and of the flock <S%H6629><s%>.

If his oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a burnt-offering <S%H7133><s%> of the herd <S%H1241><s%>, he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>: he shall <S%H7522><s%> offer <S%H7126><s%> it at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, that he may be accepted before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>; and it shall be accepted <S%H7521><s%> for him to make atonement for him <S%H3722><s%>.

And he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the bullock <S%H1121><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, shall present <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> that is at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
And he shall flay <S%H6584><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and cut <S%H5408><s%> it into its pieces <S%H5409><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and lay wood <S%H6086><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> upon the fire <S%H784><s%>;

and Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, shall lay <S%H6186><s%> the pieces <S%H7218><s%>, the head, and the fat <S%H6309><s%>, in order <S%H6186><s%> upon the wood <S%H6086><s%> that is on the fire <S%H784><s%> which is upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

but its inwards <S%H7130><s%> and its legs <S%H3767><s%> shall he wash <S%H7364><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>. And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the whole on the altar <S%H4196><s%>, for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And if his oblation <S%H7133><s%> be of the flock <S%H6629><s%>, of the sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or of the goats <S%H5795><s%>, for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>; he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>.

And he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> it on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> its blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And he shall cut <S%H5408><s%> it into its pieces <S%H5409><s%>, with its head <S%H7218><s%> and its fat <S%H6309><s%>; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall lay them in order <S%H6186><s%> on the wood <S%H6086><s%> that is on the fire <S%H784><s%> which is upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

but the inwards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%> shall he wash <S%H7364><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>. And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> the whole <S%H6999><s%>, and burn it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it is a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And if his oblation <S%H7133><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> of birds <S%H5775><s%>, then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> of turtle-doves <S%H8449><s%>, or of young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons <S%H3123><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring <S%H7126><s%> it unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and wring off <S%H4454><s%> its head <S%H7218><s%>, and burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar <S%H4196><s%>; and the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall be drained out <S%H4680><s%> on the side <S%H7023><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>;

and he shall take away <S%H5493><s%> its crop <S%H4760><s%> with the filth <S%H5133><s%> thereof <S%H7993><s%>, and cast it beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> on the east part <S%H6924><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ashes <S%H1880><s%>:

and he shall rend <S%H8156><s%> it by the wings <S%H3671><s%> thereof <S%H914><s%>, but shall not divide it asunder. And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, upon the wood <S%H6086><s%> that is upon the fire <S%H784><s%>: it is a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
